title: Status switching from "Away" to "Online" after being AFK for a while without coming back
body:
Anyone else get this? After maybe an hour of being away/AFK on the client, it changes my red "Away" circle to green "Online", and people start messaging me or inviting me to games assuming I'm there to respond, but I've been gone the entire time.

Some of my friends are also have had this problem for a while (4+ months). Anyone else having this?

replies.body: I've had this happen to myself a lot as well, and generally I notice the change in status when I click on the client at all. I'm not sure of the cause of this, but overall it'd be best to close out the client entirely if you don't plan on using it for awhile.
